title: Update Operation
description:
**This is an internal type, documented for completeness.**

An update operations describes an update of the internal vulnerability database.

ref.description: A unique identifier for this update operation.

updater.$comment: This is not as useful as it could be: an end user needs to know too much about Clair(core)'s internals to make sense of it.

kind.description: The kind of data this operation updated.
